casebody.data:
THE F. C. LOCKHART. THE NOSTRA SIGNORA DEL BORCHETTO. THE RELIANCE. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 11, 1924.) Nos. 182, 183. Charles L. Apfel, of New York City (Ellis J. Bisgyer, of New York City, on the brief), for claimant of The Borchetto. Bingham, Englar & Jones, of New York City (L. J. Matteson, of New York City, of counsel), for The F. C. Lockhart. Alexander & Ash, of New York City (Peter Alexander, of New York City, of counsel), for Newtown Creek Towing Co.

Before HOUGH, BLANTON, and BIAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER OURIABL

Decrees (298 Fed. 170) affirmed, with costs.
